Some engineers seem to be drawn by the work at a smaller company, which offers an opportunity to reshape culture with less corporate bureaucracy and more creative freedom. Facebook has become the cool kid on the block, and now Google wants to prove it can still be cool, too, said Danny Sullivan , who follows both companies closely as editor-in-chief of Search Engine Land. Susan Boyle shot to fame after auditioning for Simon Cowell 's Britain's Got Talent TV show, and she told the music mogul she dreamed of becoming as successful as her idol Elaine Paige . Elaine Paige subsequently labelled Susan Boyle a virus that swept the world , but made up for the slur by performing her track from the Chess musical I Know Him So Well with the unlikely superstar on a U.K. TV special.
